metadata.name: Esquilant Bivvy #1/19
metadata.description:
This is Esquilant Bivvy, a mountain refuge nestled in the breathtaking Aspiring National Park.

I wanted to use colour, texture and composition in this piece to portray the serene beauty of this remote alpine refuge.

Through all my work I strive to capture not just the physical attributes of the landscape, but also how it makes me feel spiritually and emotionally. I hope this piece transports you to this awe-inspiring location which is so special to me.
